mapper.select: select c.product_id, c.comment_id, c.title, c.content, c.created_date, m.nickname, p.product_id from product_comment c left outer join member m on c.member_id=m.member_id left outer join product p on c.product_id=p.product_id order by c.comment_id desc
select comment_id, member_id, title, content, created_date, product_id from product_comment where comment_id=#{value}
select c.comment_id, c.member_id, c.title, c.content, c.created_date, p.product_id from product_comment c left outer join product p on c.product_id=p.product_id where c.product_id=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into product_comment(product_id, member_id, title, content, created_date) values(#{productNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
